name: Narendra Nishad
title: Software Developer
summary: Results-driven Software Developer with 1+ year of experience in mobile and web application development. Proficient in React Native, Next.js, and React, with a strong focus on clean UI/UX, performance optimization, and scalable architecture.

responsibilities: Developed a Next.js web application with link shortener system.
Built dynamic frontend using Shadcn UI and Tailwind CSS.
Collaborated with the team for feature enhancements and user experience improvements.
Developed and maintained mobile/web apps using React Native (Expo), Next.js, and FlutterFlow.
Redesigned Boomzo's official website with SEO and performance optimization.
Integrated APIs, authentication, and backend services.
Worked with CoolCliq Agency on client projects, focusing on performance and UX.
Used Git and GitHub for version control and collaboration.
